title: Steven Spielberg Gets Personal in ‘The Fabelmans’
description: In making his autobiographical film “The Fabelmans,” he confronted some painful family secrets, as well as what it means to be Jewish in America today.
dc:creator: A.O. Scott
media:credit: Chantal Anderson for The New York Times
media:description: After more than 50 years, this is the director’s most personal film yet.
